notes.text:
This update for python-paramiko fixes the following issues:

Updated to version 2.4.3:

- CVE-2018-1000805: Fixed authentication bypass (bsc#1111151).

Bugfixes:

- Fixed Ed25519 key handling for certain key comment lengths (bsc#1200603).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Paramiko version 2.4.1, 2.3.2, 2.2.3, 2.1.5, 2.0.8, 1.18.5, 1.17.6 contains a Incorrect Access Control vulnerability in SSH server that can result in RCE. This attack appear to be exploitable via network connectivity.
